title: possible issue when sharing a link to a file located on external storage
body:
hi,

all my files are stored on external storage (smb/cifs) and they are listed correctly in owncloud.  the user account associated with the external storage has full access to the smb/cifs share.

if a file that is located on the smb/cifs storage is shared, the link that is produced works as expected if the user accessing the shared file is authenticated.

if a file that is located on the smb/cifs storage is shared, the link that is produced does not work if the user accessing the shared file isn't authenticated.  the user gets the message 'cloud not found'

if a file that is located directly within owncloud is shared, the link works regardless of whether the user is authenticated or not.

owncloud.log does not report any errors.
/var/log/apache2/access.log shows a 404 error when the link is accessed by a user that isn't authenticated: -

192.168.1.230 - - [11/jul/2013:11:53:06 +0100] "get /public.php?service=files&t=0d7973a7382a29ced5590450ce280e82 http/1.1" 404 4680 "-" "mozilla/4.0 (compatible; msie 8.0; windows nt 6.1; win64; x64; trident/4.0; .net clr 2.0.50727; slcc2; .net clr 3.5.30729; .net clr 3.0.30729; tablet pc 2.0)"

i wiped out my owncloud installation and started again - the behaviour is the same.
